Title: Vikings
Actors: Travis Fimmel, Katheryn Winnick, Clive Standen, Jessalyn Gilsig
Plot: Vikings follows the adventures of Ragnar Lothbrok: the greatest hero of his age. The series tells the saga of Ragnar's band of Viking brothers and his family as he rises to become King of ...
Awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.
